title.tooltip: A human-readable name for the model.

description.tooltip: A user-friendly description of the model and its purpose.

author.tooltip: The name or identity of the company or person that created the model.

date.tooltip: Date and time the model was created or published (Local Time).

license.tooltip: License under which the model is released.

usage hint.tooltip: Hints for using the model, where applicable.

thumbnail.tooltip: A small thumbnail icon, recommended (256x256 JPEG)

merged from.tooltip: Comma-separated list of source models (if applicable).
